title: league client.exe bad image
body: I've been having this problem for the past few days and have been scouring the boards looking for a solution, to no avail. one day (two days ago)  I randomly got the bad image error, there was no client update that day or an update for my OS, so both are up to date, ruling out one of the possible causes of the issue. So yesterday I decided to just reinstall it like it says to in the error dialogue. it worked, only, afterward, I got a different error which was easily fixed by running as admin. so that day I played my fill of league and shut the client down like normal. then today I go to start it up again thinking that the reinstall fixed it, but then I find I get the same error again?!? so I do some more scouring and see people telling me to delete certain files, so I look for the files and I don't even have them? so I look some more and see a RIOTER tell someone to try the hextech repair tool. which sounds like a great idea so I try that, I run a diagnostic and all it gives me are some logs, then I try the reinstall with the hextech repair tool and it seemed to be fine until that didn't work either, I tried running every possible solution as an admin too so it cant be that either. so I've reinstalled twice and tried every solution I've seen, pls rito, help me.
